entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
